src_original: yaduta śraddhendriyaṃ vīryendriyaṃ smṛtīndriyaṃ samādhīndriyaṃ prajñendriyam /
tasya karmaṇo vipākaṃ pratisaṃvedayāmi /  sa jīvitahetorapi pāpakaṃ karma nābhisaṃskaroti /
yān dharmān średdhendriyeṇa śraddadhāti,  vīryendriyeṇa samudānayati /
yān dharmān vīryendriyeṇa samudānayati,  tān dharmān smṛtīndriyeṇa........... //
